name: Hero-ing Addict
description:
You have journeyed to the Valley of Heroes to test your skills, one final time. With your magic sword held fast, and your wits about you, you might just make it out alive... if the life of a Hero is any life at all.

- Unique color-based melee combat!

- A small world to explore, with secrets to find!

- Multiple creature types and designs!

- Characters to talk with and ignore!

If you like the game, please rate and comment!
